data.text: @hippymid I suppose with all that's going on in the world I don't blame them! As much as I get frustrated by other people's actions, at times I find myself frustrated that I can't join them! It's a tricky situation with no easy answer. I'm thankful to everyone who still takes precautions!

@Katie_Jones2 I’m not sure people give your situation a second thought Katie. Getting back to normal is the focus for many without considering how that effects people like you and your family. We continue to wear masks and keep a social distance

@hippymid Yes it's the same where I live. My husband now has it too and is having to isolate away from me due to my vulnerability. It's hard when for most people it is a mild illness but not for me. I desperately want normality too 😔
@Katie_Jones2 So sorry to hear this Katie. It shows that we are not out of the woods yet, though walking around you would think we were! x
@Katie_Jones2 oh no Kate!!! so sorry to hear this - rest up when you can x
@Katie_Jones2 I feel like this should be your next clothing purchase … such rotten luck. Stay well, all of you! https://t.co/7dqLCi0DGO
@Katie_Jones2 I'm sorry Katie....hope you don't catch it again x
@Katie_Jones2 I will be too busy crying and collapsing in an exhausted heap to even consider dancing! https://t.co/T0y1Z1bDko
